name: Deshi News Aggregator
author: Shaharia Azam

sections.description:
Keep your visitor in your website. Deshi News Aggregator fetch the latest news from Prothom Alo and you can display
Prothom Alo latest news in your website. Currently you can only news in widget.

Currently we support news from Prothom Alo. Another 5 news source will be available in our plugin’s next update.

Upcoming source:

  • Daily Ittefaq
  • BDNews24
  • BD Pratidin
  • Bangla News 24

You can read details about this plugin from here
sections.installation:
Installation of this plugin is so simple.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/deshi-news-aggregator directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

No extra settings required for now. Advance settings will be available in our next release.
sections.faq:
Installation failed

If your installation failed, then please check your database and see if there is any extra table created with news_headlines table.
If created, then delete that table and re-install the plugin again. If still fails, write about your problem in support.
I will be happy to assist.

How can I request more features?

I always love to hear from you. If you have any ideas to improve this plugin to make it more useful, please write me at mail@shaharia.com with details.

Can I get advanced support?

Yes, of course you can. To get quicker support, write an email at mail@shaharia.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Performance improvements

1.0

  • Initial release with one source (Prothom Alo)
